website_summaries.verdict: A fixed broadhead that boasts sharp, high-strength blades, premium construction, and other great features.
pros: Consists of aircraft-grade aluminum ferrule, guaranteeing the broadhead can serve you well both now and in the future
Features a corrosion-resistant and rustproof tip
Back edge of the blades is sharpened to cut going in or out
Includes a convenient 4-point blade locking system
cons: Tends to shoot lower than comparable broadheads
Delivers inferior results in comparison to similar fixed broadheads

customer_reviews.title: As long as the blades are sharp and the accuracy is good, there's little reason to think that one quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave these 5 stars on the basis that they have the exact same point of impact as my field points and the Grim Reaper Razortips that I also own. The blades are razor sharp and it is perfectly balanced. When it comes to performance: It's a three-bladed broadhead. These things are rocket science. As long as the blades are sharp and the accuracy is good, there's little reason to think that one quality fixed broadhead is significantly better than another.
customer_reviews.author: Zhukov

customer_reviews.title: Best broadheads ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been shooting grim reapers for years. Best broadheads on the planet in my opinion. I've shot all their different size cut mechanicals. Love them all. Fly great and extremely lethal. Expect short blood trails. Deer usually drop within 40 to 60 yds. Big hogs maybe 100 yds. As long as I Bowhunt I will shoot grim reapers. Try others if you want but you want find a better broadhead.
customer_reviews.author: Bowhunt220

customer_reviews.title: Tough Broadhead
customer_reviews.text: Son shot a doe with one in a recurve crossbow. Took a rib out going in and took a rib out going out and stuck in the dirt. Doe piled up 50 yards later.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: Build great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This broad heads are build great! They are very sharp as I cut my finger trying to examine them on my arrow. Love how it's sharp on both the front of the blade and the rear side of it too. My buddy wants to steal them on my now because he sees how well they are designed
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Clearwater

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Adequate but not great. Only used once so far and had a clean pass through catching both lungs. Blood trail was quite small and deer was 125 yards away from point of shot. I have had better results from the G5 fixed blades.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done very well
customer_reviews.text: Shot a doe at 43 yards behind some brush. Clean broadside hit and the arrow went through the doe. I think I’ll keep using these as long as they make them.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Sturgell

customer_reviews.title: The only downfall is that the 100 grain broad heads ...
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall is that the 100 grain broad heads shoot four to six inches lower than my 100 grain field tips. If I found something that shot similar to my field tips I would buy them over the grim reapers.
customer_reviews.author: John McMinn

customer_reviews.title: When your going for Godzilla
customer_reviews.text: Fast straight shooting broadheads. Super sharp. Make sure you don't lose the tool for removal and tightening them
customer_reviews.author: P. A. WIGGINS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appear well made, with close tolerances. Will know more after this season is over.
customer_reviews.author: Spec

customer_reviews.title: Great American made product from family company
customer_reviews.text: Great broadhead from a great company. American made and parts American sourced! Still a family business and not some huge cooperation. Great customer service. Have had great success with these heads.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rasp-Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Very strong broadhead, shot a 100 lb hog in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong broadhead , shot a 100 lb hog in the face right below his eye and it went through and lodged into shoulder, broadhead was not even damaged .
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

product_meta.title: Grim Reaper Hades Fixed Blade Broadhead 1 3/16" Cut 100gr
product_meta.description: This is not your ordinary fixed blade head. The back edge of the blades are sharepened to cut whether going in or out, with a bone crushing solid stainless steel v-notch tip and 4 point blade locking system making the Hades the best flying, best penetrating fixed blade on the market!
feature_bullets: Sharpened on Blade backside for maximum internal cut
